lx4p

Class LXSACN

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXDMXInterface
      • lx4p.LXDMXEthernet
        • lx4p.LXSACN

  • public class LXSACN
extends LXDMXEthernet
    LXSACN.java

    LXSACN partially implements E1.31,
    Lightweight streaming protocol for transport of DMX512 using ACN

    sACN E 1.31 is a public standard published by the PLASA technical standards program
    http://tsp.plasa.org/tsp/documents/published_docs.php

      • getUniverse

        public int getUniverse()
        dmx universe

        Each dmx stream of up to 512 slots/addresses/channels is called a universe.
        Universe numbers vary by protocol. The first universe in zero for Art-Net and one for sACN

        Specified by:
        getUniverse in class LXDMXInterface
        Returns:
        the dmx universe

        Specified by:

      • checkFlagsAndLength

        public boolean checkFlagsAndLength(int index,
                                   int size)
        Utility for checking flags + length bytes

        flags | length is 2 bytes starting at index
        highest nibble is the flags and should be 0x7
        lowest 12 bits are length

        Parameters:
        index - starting index of 2byte flags + length field
        size - to compare with expected size
        Returns:
        true if flags and size are good

      • isEmptyUUIDBytes

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if all zeros
